ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Hey There!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe a Dark Reaver at level 24 :p Back in the day when the game first came out we didnt have no Dark Reaver at 24.  SK s today are spoiled :) ... From: Jason
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe a Dark Reaver at level 24 :p Back in the day when the game first came
out we didnt have no Dark Reaver at 24. SK's today are spoiled :)




-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Selph <jselph@...>
To: 'shadowknight@egroups.com' <shadowknight@egroups.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 5:19 PM
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Hey There!!!


>After finally getting to 22, I was amazed at how easy it was to even solo,
>or to have fun in a group with either a druid or a shaman. Outside with a
>druid who can harmony to just pull 1 mob, then engulfing darkness or snare
>to slow them down. Add the druids DOT, slap on a fear and have fun chasing
>the poor mob around while you, your pet and the druid whack on it.
>
>I am only level 24 and a human with a natural 90 strength (equipment and
>personal buffs bring that to 122) and I am constantly double attacking for
>40-50 each hit with a Dark Reaver. I have even scored the occasional triple
>attack.
>
>My advice is to get a dark reaver for about 400pp. Hard to save up for but
>well worth it for the 20 damage 42 delay.
>
>Don't forget about your pet. If you are in a reasonably safe area make
sure
>your pet is there. at 22 mine has about 200 hit points and hits for 14-16.
>This is like an extra dot as well as something that gives you a few seconds
>head start if you need to run.
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
>From: Chip O'Brien [mailto:cobrien@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 2:04 PM
>To: 'shadowknight@egroups.com'
>Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Hey There!!!
>
>
>
>hehe.
>
>YAR. Doz spellyz getz betta at 22! Oi hurd dat dey eben betta at lebul
>tirty!!!
>
>Nagek Nytemare
>Shader Nite
>Army of Grobb
>Tallon Zek
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Jason Selph [ mailto:jselph@... <mailto:jselph@...> ]

>Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Hey There!!!
>Importance: Low
>
>
>Just wait till you get spells. Up till now you have pretty much been a
>warrior. You are about to see what being a shadowknight really means.
>
>HSK 24
>Sol Ro
